ntional touching, either directly or through clothing.
. . . I’m sure you remember from the deposition that paragraph (1) of the
definition remained in effect. Judge Wright ruled that that was to be the
guiding definition, and that paragraphs (2) and (3) were stricken....I
suppose, since you have now read portions of the transcript again, that
you  were  reminded  that  you  did  not  ask  for  any  clarification  of  the
terms. Is that correct? Of the definition?
A:No, sir. I thought it was...a
